name: validateOracleAcoFile
description: Validate the provided Oracle ACO (Advanced Cloning Options) file.

is_live_mount.description: Boolean that determines whether the ACO file is being used for a Live Mount.

body.description: Contents of the Advanced Cloning Options file in base64 encoded format.

$ul: **acoMap**: List of Advanced Cloning Options (ACO) parameter values that were parsed.
**acoParameterErrors**: Other generic errors with the Advanced Cloning Options (ACO) parameters.
**acoValueValidationErrors**: List of Advanced Cloning Options (ACO) errors pertaining to the specified values.
